meanings.definition: To show or demonstrate the existence of something
meanings.sent1: She was evidencing her happiness by smiling brightly.
meanings.sent2: The scientist was evidencing the theory through experiments.
meanings.sent3: The cat was evidencing its hunger by meowing loudly.
meanings.sent4: The flowers evidencing the arrival of spring with their vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The teacher was evidencing her excitement for the new school year with a big grin.

meanings.definition: To provide evidence or proof of something
meanings.sent1: The fingerprints on the glass were evidencing his presence at the scene.
meanings.sent2: The report was evidencing the success of the marketing campaign.
meanings.sent3: The overflowing laundry basket was evidencing a busy week.
meanings.sent4: The cracked mirror was evidencing years of neglect.
meanings.sent5: The broken window was evidencing the force of the storm.
